version_description:
- Updated Tilt Controls
- Adjusted some of Ruby's dialog

- Updated Tilt Controls
- Adjusted some of Ruby's dialog

- Major difficulty tuning update!
- Improved match-making to create a more fair challenge
- Adjusted number of opponents and powerups in races
- Smoothed out difficulty ramp
- Lowered Daily Challenge entry to Level 3
- Lowered T

- Major difficulty tuning update!
- Improved match-making to create a more fair challenge
- Adjusted number of opponents and powerups in races
- Smoothed out difficulty ramp
- Lowered Daily Challenge entry to Level 3
- Lowered T

Big update! Thanks again to all of you for your feedback. We're listening.
- Driver, Car and Track unlocks are now displayed on the Profile/Settings popup so you can track your progress to the next unlock.
- Easier to unlock Drivers: Changed Dri

Big update! Thanks again to all of you for your feedback. We're listening.
- Driver, Car and Track unlocks are now displayed on the Profile/Settings popup so you can track your progress to the next unlock.
- Easier to unlock Drivers: Changed Dri

Be sure to get the latest updates in order to see the latest Tournaments and challenges!
In this build:
- Added changing time of day and weather to main screen races.
- Improved Daily Challenge reward wheel behavior. Remember, every time you

Be sure to get the latest updates in order to see the latest Tournaments and challenges!
In this build:
- Added changing time of day and weather to main screen races.
- Improved Daily Challenge reward wheel behavior. Remember, every time you

Major Powerup tuning update! For more detail, see the latest blog post at vectorunit.com.
- Buffed many Epics: Warp Speed, Boost Rocket, Death Bat, Hydra, Big Bang, Police Chase, Tesla Coil are all more powerful.
- Barrage and Jammer are now Epic

Major Powerup tuning update! For more detail, see the latest blog post at vectorunit.com.
- Buffed many Epics: Warp Speed, Boost Rocket, Death Bat, Hydra, Big Bang, Police Chase, Tesla Coil are all more powerful.
- Barrage and Jammer are now Epic

Account Management is here at last!
- Sign in to secure your save game online.
- Sync and play across multiple devices.
- Reset your save game and start fresh. (WARNING: This deletes everything!)
Plus various fixes:
- New character dialogs

Account Management is here at last!
- Sign in to secure your save game online.
- Sync and play across multiple devices.
- Reset your save game and start fresh. (WARNING: This deletes everything!)
Plus various fixes:
- New character dialogs

- Gamepads now supported (while driving)
- New languages: Nederlands, Svenska, 한국어, 日本語, 简体中文, 繁體中文
- Stability fixes
- Fixed Rez "curing" his own ability
- Assorted polish and bug fixes

New languages added!
Now supports French, Italian, German and Spanish.
Major Tournament Update!
- New themed Tournaments for new cars and more
- Balanced Tournaments where every player competes at the same level
- Win exclusive in-game p

- Fixed Spanish so it works in ALL Spanish speaking regions.
- Minor improvements and bug fixes.

- Added device information for tech support
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

Say hello to the new Shop experience!
- Daily powerup, car paint and decal specials
- Coins and gems have moved to the coin/gem button
Optimized graphics now EXTRA optimized.

Difficulty tuning! New store specials! Fixed bugs! Thanks to everyone for your continuing feedback.
- Tweaked difficulty tuning and matchmaking to make races a little bit easier
- Keep your eyes peeled for amazing new Special Offers in the Shop

- Keep your eyes peeled for amazing new Special Offers in the Shop

- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

- See upcoming Tournaments

Massive Halloween Update! Win exclusive characters, decals and more in special Halloween Tournaments.
- Major car re-balancing. All cars have be fine tuned for personality and balance.
- Skull Knocker and Sandrail now available in vehicle challeng

Massive Halloween Update! Win exclusive characters, decals and more in special Halloween Tournaments.
- Major car re-balancing. All cars have be fine tuned for personality and balance.
- Skull Knocker and Sandrail now available in vehicle challeng

- Fixed car stability issue that was causing some cars to flip around.
- Minor bug fixes

- Fixed car stability issue that was causing some cars to flip around.
- Minor bug fixes

- New tournament system. See competitor's level, cars and drivers.
- Fixed it so you can listen to your own music in background (for real this time).
- Various bug fixes.

- Maintenance release.
- Improved stability and bug fixes.

Hot Wheels™ Special Event begins!
- Compete in limited time Hot Wheels Tournaments
- Race on twisty orange Hot Wheels tracks
- Win exclusive Hot Wheels car

Hot Wheels™ Special Event begins!
- Compete in limited time Hot Wheels Tournaments
- Race on twisty orange Hot Wheels tracks
- Win exclusive Hot Wheels car

- Updated icon for Hot Wheels event.
- Fixed a few minor stability issues.

- Updated icon for Hot Wheels event.
- Fixed a few minor stability issues.

The Vector Unit team wishes you all a happy holiday season!

In this update:
- Updated Tournaments
- Fixed a few bugs and stability issues.

The Vector Unit team wishes you all a happy holiday season!

In this update:
- Updated Tournaments
- Fixed a few bugs and stability issues.

In this update:
- Fixed Tornado and El Zipo character ability bug where you only got spun around once.
- New decals added: Lightning, Dragon, Hawaiian Flower, and Snow!
- Two new songs added for your listening pleasure.
- Various bug fixe

In this update:
- Fixed Tornado and El Zipo character ability bug where you only got spun around once.
- New decals added: Lightning, Dragon, Hawaiian Flower, and Snow!
- Two new songs added for your listening pleasure.
- Various bug fixe

In this update:
- Interstitial ads are switched off if you make an IAP in the game.
- Mine mode layouts have been updated. Check 'em out!
- Drift mode is now lap-based instead of time-based. Get the best drift score you can in a single lap.

In this update:
- Interstitial ads are switched off if you make an IAP in the game.
- Mine mode layouts have been updated. Check 'em out!
- Drift mode is now lap-based instead of time-based. Get the best drift score you can in a single lap.

Halloween update!
- October brings spooky special events. Firework Fury challenges are now trick-filled Pumpkin Patches. Watch for chances to win Mr Happy in exclusive weekly tournaments and sales.
- Important! We have a new cloud save system

Halloween update!
- October brings spooky special events. Firework Fury challenges are now trick-filled Pumpkin Patches. Watch for chances to win Mr Happy in exclusive weekly tournaments and sales.
- Important! We have a new cloud save system

In this update:
- Improved cloud syncing and game saving functionality
- Stability improvements

In this update:
- Improved cloud syncing and game saving functionality

In this update:
- The Halloween event ends. But don't be too sad...Mr Happy will return next year!
- Bug fixes
